Topic.Title: Help creating an desk with opening/closing drawer.

Posts.EditableText: For the life of me, I can't figure this out. I have a desk in my room. I created an object called drawer, but upon playing the game, the drawer shows up as a clickable link, giving it the appearance of being as standalone drawer. I just want the desk and drawer to be connected, allowing the player to open the desk drawer(resulting in description of items in drawer), and close the drawer(stating that desk drawer is closed). Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: Or you can create the desk as a container, housing the drawer and have the  drawer (or "child" of the "parent" object desk) only display when looked at.   In the online interface, there is a button to click for containers "hide children until parent is looked at."   That way, someone can walk in the room and see "desk" but to see the drawer they will need to first look at the desk.
